elements.description:
`api-endpoint-documentation`

A component to generate documentation for an endpoint from AMF model

This element works with [AMF](https://github.com/mulesoft/amf) data model.
To properly compute all the information relevant to endpoint documentation
set the following properties:

- amfModel - as AMF's WebApi data model
- endpoint - As AMF's EndPoint data model

When set, this will automatically populate the wiew with data.

## Updating API's base URI

By default the component render the documentation as it is defined
in the AMF model. Sometimes, however, you may need to replace the base URI
of the API with something else. It is useful when the API does not
have base URI property defined (therefore this component render relative
paths instead of URIs) or when you want to manage different environments.

To update base URI value either update `baseUri` property or use
`iron-meta` with key `ApiBaseUri`. First method is easier but the second
gives much more flexibility since it use a [monostate pattern](http://wiki.c2.com/?MonostatePattern)
to manage base URI property.

When the component constructs the funal URI for the endpoint it does the following:
- if `baseUri` is set it uses this value as a base uri for the endpoint
- else if `iron-meta` with key `ApiBaseUri` exists and contains a value
it uses it uses this value as a base uri for the endpoint
- else if `amfModel` is set then it computes base uri value from main
model document
Then it concatenates computed base URI with `endpoint`'s path property.

### Example

```html
<iron-meta key="ApiBaseUri" value="https://domain.com"></iron-meta>
```

To update value of the `iron-meta`:
```javascript
new Polymer.IronMeta({key: 'ApiBaseUri'}).value = 'https://other.domain';
```

Note: The element will not get notified about the change in `iron-meta`.
The change will be reflected whehn `amfModel` or `endpoint` property chnage.

## Styling

`<api-endpoint-documentation>` provides the following custom properties and mixins for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--api-endpoint-documentation` | Mixin applied to this elment | `{}`
`--arc-font-headline` | Theme mixin, Applied to h1 element (title) | `{}`
`--arc-font-code1` | Theme mixin, applied to the URL area | `{}`
`--api-endpoint-documentation-url-font-size` | Font size of endpoin URL | `16px`
`--api-endpoint-documentation-url-background-color` | Background color of the URL section | `#424242`
`--api-endpoint-documentation-url-font-color` | Font color of the URL area | `#fff`
`--api-endpoint-documentation-bottom-navigation-border-color` | Color of the top border of the bottom navigartion | `#546E7A`
`--api-endpoint-documentation-bottom-navigation-color` | Color of of the bottom navigartion (icon + text) | `#546E7A`

properties.name: amfModel
properties.description:
Generated AMF json/ld model form the API spec.
The element assumes the object of the first array item to be a
type of `"http://raml.org/vocabularies/document#Document`
on AMF vocabulary.

It is only usefult for the element to resolve references.

properties.name: aware
properties.description: `raml-aware` scope property to use.

properties.name: endpoint
properties.description:
Method's endpoint definition as a
`http://raml.org/vocabularies/http#endpoint` of AMF model.

properties.name: baseUri
properties.description:
A property to set to override AMF's model base URI information.
When this property is set, the `endpointUri` property is recalculated.

properties.name: endpointName
properties.description:
Endpoint name.
It should be either a "displayName" or endpoint's relative
path.

properties.name: description
properties.description: Computed value of method description from `method` property.

properties.name: path
properties.description: Computed value of endpoint's path.

properties.name: hasCustomProperties
properties.description:
Computed value from current `method`. True if the model contains
custom properties (annotations in RAML).

properties.name: security
properties.description:
Computed value of AMF security definition from `method`
property.

properties.name: hasSecurity
properties.description: Computed value, true if `security` has values.

properties.name: narrow
properties.description: If set it will renders the view in the narrow layout.

properties.name: extendsTypes
properties.description: List of traits and resource types, if any.

properties.name: parentType
properties.description:
Computed value of a parent type.
In RAML it is resource type that can be applied to a resource.

properties.name: hasParentType
properties.description: Computed value, true if `parentType` has a value.

properties.name: parentTypeName
properties.description: Computed value for parent type name.

properties.name: traits
properties.description: List of traits appied to this endpoint

properties.name: hasTraits
properties.description: Computed value, true if the endpoint has traits.

properties.name: hasExtension
properties.description: True if the endpoint is extended by either traits or resource type.

properties.name: operations
properties.description:
A list of AMF's supported operations (HTTP methods) in this
endpoint

properties.name: previous
properties.description:
Model to generate a link to previous HTTP endpoint.
It should contain `id` and `label` properties

properties.name: hasPreviousLink
properties.description: Computed value, true if `previous` is set

properties.name: next
properties.description:
Model to generate a link to next HTTP endpoint.
It should contain `id` and `label` properties

properties.name: hasNextLink
properties.description: Computed value, true if `next` is set

properties.name: hasPagination
properties.description: Computed value, true to render bottom navigation

properties.name: scrollTarget
properties.description:
Scroll target used to observe `scroll` event.
When set the element will observe scroll and inform other components
about changes in navigation while scrolling through methods list.
The navigation event contains `passive: true` property that
determines that it's not user triggered navigation but rather
context enforced.

methods.name: _getValue
methods.description: Gets a signle scalar value from a model.

params.name: model
params.description: Amf model to extract the value from.

params.name: key
params.description: Model key to search for the value

methods.name: _getValueArray
methods.description: Gets values from a model as an array of `@value` properties.

params.name: model
params.description: Amf model to extract the value from.

params.name: key
params.description: Model key to search for the value

methods.name: _hasType
methods.description: Checks if a model has a type.

return.desc: True if model has a type.

methods.name: _hasProperty
methods.description: Checks if a shape has a property.

methods.name: _computeServerVariables
methods.description: Computes value for `serverVariables` property.

methods.name: _computeEndpointVariables
methods.description: Computes value for `endpointVariables` property.

methods.name: _computePayload
methods.description: Computes value for the `payload` property

methods.name: _computeReturns
methods.description: Computes value for `returns` property

methods.name: _computeSecurity
methods.description: Computes value for `security` property

methods.name: _computeHasCustomProperties
methods.description: Computes value for `hasCustomProperties` property.

methods.name: _computeServer
methods.description: Computes value for `server` property that is later used with other computations.

methods.name: _computeEndpointUri
methods.description: Computes endpoint's URI based on `amfModel` and `endpoint` models.

methods.name: _getBaseUri
methods.description:
Computes base URI value from either `baseUri`, `iron-meta` with
`ApiBaseUri` key or `amfModel` value (in this order).

return.desc: Base uri value. Can be empty string.

methods.name: _getAmfBaseUri
methods.description: Computes base URI from AMF model.

methods.name: _computeExpects
methods.description: Computes value for the `expects` property.

methods.name: _computePropertyValue
methods.description:
Tries to find an example value (whether it's default value or from an
example) to put it into snippet's values.

methods.name: _computeEndpointName
methods.description:
Computes method's endpoint name.
It looks for `http://schema.org/name` in the endpoint definition and
if not found it uses path as name.

methods.name: _computePath
methods.description: Computes value of `path` property

methods.name: _computeExtendsTypes
methods.description: Computes `ectendsTypes`

methods.name: _computeParentType
methods.description: Computes parent type as RAML's resource type.

methods.name: _computeHasParentType
methods.description: Computes value for `hasParentType` property

methods.name: _computeParentTypeName
methods.description: Computes vaolue for `parentTypeName`

methods.name: _computeTraits
methods.description: Computes value for `traits` property

methods.name: _computeTraitName
methods.description: Computes name of a trait.

methods.name: _computeHasExtension
methods.description: Computes value for `hasExtension` property

methods.name: _computeOperations
methods.description: Computes list of operations for the endpoint.

methods.name: _computeHasNavigation
methods.description: Computes value for `hasPagination` property

methods.name: _navigatePrevious
methods.description: Navigates to next method. Calls `_navigate` with id of previous item.

methods.name: _navigateNext
methods.description: Navigates to next method. Calls `_navigate` with id of next item.

methods.name: _navigate
methods.description:
Dispatches `api-navigation-selection-changed` so other components
can update their state.

methods.name: _scrollTargetChanged
methods.description: Handles scroll target chane and adds scroll event.

methods.name: _scrollHandler
methods.description:
Scroll handler for `scrollTarget`.
It does not stall main thred by executing the action after nex render.

methods.name: _checkMethodsPosition
methods.description: I hope this won't be required in final version :(

methods.name: _occupiesMainScrollArea
methods.description: Function that checks if an `element` is in the main scrolling area.

params.name: dir
params.description: Direction where the scroll is going (up or down)

return.desc:
True when it determines that the element is in the main
scroll area,

methods.name: _notifyPassiveNavigation
methods.description:
Dispatches `api-navigation-selection-changed` custom event with
`passive: true` set on the detail object.
Listeners should not react on this event except for the ones that
should reflect passive navigation change.

params.name: selected
params.description: Id of selected method as in AMF model.

elements.name: ApiElements.ApiEndpointDocumentation
